entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Subscription Upgrade process
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 26, 18:00 UTC  -  Apr 27, 00:00 UTC

Apr 15, 14:33 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 26/04/2022 18:00 UTC
End time : 27/04/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : We will be performing maintenance on our internal tools, during this operation, it will be impossible for our customers to make new subscriptions. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Service improvement : This operation aims to optimize the performance.

entry.title: [P19][Webhosting] - MX Plan
entry.content:
Apr 20, 18:29 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/04/2022 08:10 UTC
End Time : 20/04/2022 18:20 UTC
Service impact : All mails have been delivered successfully
Current status : Resolved

Apr 20, 18:11 UTC
Update - 97% of mails have been delivered. The time left for the full delivery is 30 minutes.

Apr 20, 17:06 UTC
Update - 75% of mails have been delivered. The time left for the full delivery is 1 hour.

Apr 20, 16:12 UTC
Update - 50% of mails have been delivered. We estimate that the time left for the full delivery is 2 hours.
We'll have another update in an hour.

Apr 20, 15:16 UTC
Update - Delivery of pending emails is still ongoing. 25% of mails have been delivered.
We estimate that the full delivery will take 3 hours.

Apr 20, 13:08 UTC
Update - UPDATE: With reference to the last update from our technical team, delivery of pending emails is still ongoing.
We can confirm that no email has been lost during this incident.
we will keep you informed on the progress. We apologize for any inconvenience caused

Apr 20, 11:10 UTC
Monitoring - After the reboot of the server hosting the Filerz24, all mailbox are now available.
Email in queue since 02:00 UTC is currently in process and will be delivered in the next 3 hours
There is no loss of data.
We keep the situation under observation while we receive all emails

Apr 20, 10:34 UTC
Update - UPDATE : Disks present in the filerz have been installed on the new server.
Server is currently booting. We are monitoring the situation.
Email Services are restored for most customers.
Pending emails will be delivered once server is back in service.

Apr 20, 09:31 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are currently working on filerz24.
All mails received before 02:00 UTC are accessible. New mails after this period are stored but not delivered.
Sending email can be slowed down.
No loss of data is to be reported.
We will come back to you as soon as intervention is complete.

Apr 20, 08:10 UTC
Update - Filerz2024 is back in service.
Ongoing actions: STORAGE team is currently working on recovering filerz24 . A replacement is still on.
We will provide updates as soon as possible.

Apr 20, 06:12 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions: : An intervention is still in progress on the last two servers :
filerz24.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.

We will provide updates as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Apr 19, 18:02 UTC

filerz24.mail.ha.ovh.net.
filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.

Apr 19, 15:36 UTC

filerz2024.mail.ha.ovh.net.
